name: Hinted Data
description: Hinted is a data marketplace built for the new internet. It enables users to buy and sell valuable datasets—from B2B leads to intent-based consumer data—through a transparent, blockchain-powered platform. Hinted bridges the gap between traditional Web2 data practices and the emerging Web3 economy, offering decentralized tools and tokenized rewards. The platform features a hybrid model: enterprise clients buy data off-platform via fiat, while Web3 users can access the same datasets on-platform using the $HINT token. This structure funds recurring token buybacks and creates a sustainable ecosystem for all participants.
